faq.question: Where do I find tip sheets for ambulatory workflows?
faq.answer: Press F1 → Learning Home Dashboard → select role-specific section.

faq.question: How do I set a patient’s preferred lab?
faq.answer: During rooming, in the Rooming Navigator, select the Preferred Lab field.

faq.question: Why isn’t my Medicare Wellness form showing?
faq.answer: Scroll to bottom of Screenings Navigator; if missing, go to Flowsheets → search 'Medicare Wellness'.

faq.question: What’s the difference between internal and external referrals?
faq.answer: Internal referrals often require prior auth and coordination; external referrals have simpler routing.

faq.question: A provider is missing from referral orders. What should I do?
faq.answer: Use the FIND tool to enroll the provider into Epic.

faq.question: How do charges drop for immunizations?
faq.answer: Document in Immunization activity → both med and admin charges drop automatically.

faq.question: Why didn’t my point-of-care test charge?
faq.answer: Ensure status = Final in Enter/Edit Results; otherwise no charge posts.

faq.question: How do I schedule a telemedicine appointment?
faq.answer: Use the Telemedicine Visit Type when scheduling; otherwise Video Connect won’t activate.

faq.question: Patient says they didn’t get their MyChart code. What do I do?
faq.answer: Regenerate and send via text/email; remind them it’s valid for 14 days.

faq.question: How do I know which pool I belong to?
faq.answer: Open In Basket → pool name shows at top (department name); managers assign if unclear.

faq.question: What if refill requests are still routing to old Ascension Epic?
faq.answer: Submit a ticket to SureScripts including provider name and MRN.

faq.question: Can I use Epic for PDMP checks?
faq.answer: Not yet — log into ILPMP.org until state approves Epic integration.

faq.question: What is the In Basket used for in pharmacy?
faq.answer: It’s used for communication between nursing and pharmacy, e.g., med time adjustments, refill requests.

faq.question: What if IV or unit dose cards don’t print automatically?
faq.answer: Use the Card Status or manually reprint labels via the dispensing button.

faq.question: How do I reprint cart fill labels?
faq.answer: Go to dispensing button → reprint labels manually.

faq.question: What if my label printer isn’t working?
faq.answer: Reroute printing to another printer; open an IT ticket if issue persists.

faq.question: How do I validate barcodes for new meds from Cardinal?
faq.answer: Use Validate Barcodes workflow; scan med to confirm NDC on central list.

faq.question: What if a medication’s NDC isn’t in the system?
faq.answer: Submit scan details (med name, strength, NDC, manufacturer, cost) so pharmacy can update or assign IID.

faq.question: How are mixture records handled?
faq.answer: Select via clinical edit details; switch base if needed (NS vs dextrose). Ticket if missing.

faq.question: How do I manage patient’s own meds?
faq.answer: Set charge method = no charge, change dispense code to 'patient supply', uncheck patient supply box.

faq.question: Where do I find role-specific tip sheets?
faq.answer: Press F1 → Learning Home Dashboard → select pharmacist or technician.

faq.question: What if my ADS tab shows blank IID?
faq.answer: Open IT ticket to request IID for missing medication (except mixtures).
